sentences.english: He teaches all liberal sciences and gives account of dead souls that died in sin.

sentences.english: Arts and Humanities, we are told, are useless for the making of technological innovation.

sentences.english: The irony of humanism is that it dehumanizes .

sentences.english: It is of great significance to strengthen humanist education in order to change the bad social mood.

sentences.english: Sports belongs to humanism and social science from the classification of scientific system.
